data.text: How long, O men, will my honor be maligned?
Know that the LORD has set apart the godly for Himself;
Be angry, yet do not sin;4:4 Or In your anger do not sin or Tremble and do not sin; cited in Ephesians 4:26
Offer the sacrifices of the righteous
Many ask, “Who can show us the good?”
You have filled my heart with more joy
I will lie down and sleep in peace,
